DateOfClaim.QuestionLabel: When do you want your Carer's Allowance claim to start?

Cared35HoursBefore.QuestionLabel: Were you caring for the person for more than 35 hours a week before this date?

Cared35Hours.QuestionLabel: Do you spend 35 hours or more each week caring for the person you care for?

BreaksSinceClaim.QuestionLabel: Have you had any breaks in caring for this person since 03/01/2014?

MedicalCare.QuestionLabel: Did you or the person you care for get any medical treatment or professional care during this time?

ReasonClaimant.QuestionLabel: Where were you during the break?

ReasonCaree.QuestionLabel: Where was the person you care for during the break?

BreaksSinceClaim.QuestionLabel: Have you had any more breaks in caring for this person since 03/01/2014?

LiveSameAddress.QuestionLabel: Do they live at the same address as you?

NormallyLiveInGB.QuestionLabel: Do you normally live in England, Scotland or Wales?

TimeOutsideGBLast3Years.QuestionLabel: Have you been out of England, Scotland or Wales for more than 52 weeks in the last 3 years before your claim date?

CourseOfEducation.QuestionLabel: Have you been on a course of education since your claim date: 03/01/2014?

SelfEmployed.QuestionLabel: Have you been self-employed at any time since 27/12/2013?

DateStarted.QuestionLabel: When did you start this self employed work?

DateEnded.QuestionLabel: When did you finish this job?

PaidForPension.QuestionLabel: Do you pay into a pension and/or have any work related expenses?

Expense.QuestionLabel: Tell us what these are for, how much and how often
Expense.Answer: Some pension expenses paying 200 a week for xyz

PaidForJobExpenses.QuestionLabel: Do you pay for anything necessary to do your job?

Expense.QuestionLabel: Tell us what the cost is for, how much, how often and who to.
Expense.Answer: Some job expenses paying 200 a week for xyz

Employed.QuestionLabel: Have you been employed at any time since 03/07/2013?

EmploymentAdditionalInfo.QuestionLabel: Do you want to add anything about your work?
EmploymentAdditionalInfo.Other: I want to tell more about my job

HavePartner.QuestionLabel: Have you had a partner/spouse living with you since your claim date: 03/01/2014?

SeparatedFromPartner.QuestionLabel: Have you separated from your partner/spouse since the date you want to claim from: 03/01/2014?

IsCaree.QuestionLabel: Is your partner/spouse the person you are claiming Carer's Allowance for?

OtherMoneySSP.QuestionLabel: Have you had any Statutory Sick Pay SSP since the date you want to claim from 03/01/2014?

OtherMoneySP.QuestionLabel: Have you had any Statutory Maternity Pay SMP, Statutory Paternity Pay SPP or Statutory Adoption Pay SAP since the date you want to claim from 03/01/2014?

OtherMoney.QuestionLabel: Have you claimed or received any other benefits since your claim date: 03/01/2014?

OtherMoneyPayments.QuestionLabel: Have you received any payments for the person you care for or any other person since your claim date 03/01/2014

EEAReceivePensionsBenefits.QuestionLabel: Do you, or any member of your family, receive any benefits or pensions from any other European Economic Area EEA state or Switzerland?

EEAReceivePensionsBenefitsDetails.QuestionLabel: Give details, including who was paid, the local name of the benefit, the amount and dates of any payments.

EEAWorkingInsurance.QuestionLabel: Are you, or a member of your family, working in or paying insurance to, another European Economic Area EEA state or Switzerland?

WelshCommunication.QuestionLabel: Do you live in Wales and would like to receive future communications in Welsh?

AdditionalInformation.QuestionLabel: Do you want to tell us any additional information about your claim?

DeclarationStatement.Title: The declarations below sets out your legal responsibilities in respect of your claim.
DeclarationStatement.Content: I declare that I understand the Carer's Allowance Claim Notes and that the information provided on this claim form is correct and complete.

I understand that I must report all changes in my circumstances or that of the person that I am caring for which may affect my entitlement promptly and by failing to do so I may be liable to prosecution or face a financial penalty.

I will use the online service or phone 0345 608 4321 or write to Carer's Allowance Unit, Palatine House, Lancaster Road, Preston, PR1 1HB to report a change in my circumstances or that of the person that I am caring for.

If I give false or incomplete information or fail to report changes in my circumstances or that of the person that I am caring for promptly, I understand that my Carer's Allowance may be stopped or reduced and any overpayment of Carer's Allowance may be recovered. In addition I may be prosecuted or face a financial penalty.

DeclarationQuestion.QuestionLabel: Please tick this box to confirm that you understand and make the declarations above.

DisclaimerStatement.Title: This is my claim for Carer's Allowance.
DisclaimerStatement.Content: I understand that if I am paid Carer's Allowance it may affect the benefits paid to [Test Casenine].

If the person you are caring for receives certain benefits, the amount they receive may be affected by your claim for Carer's Allowance. Because of this we need both of you to understand the potential consequences of your claim to Carer's Allowance.

If [Test Casenine] gets a Severe Disability Premium with their income-based Jobseeker's Allowance, Income Support, income-related Employment and Support Allowance, Housing Benefit, they may no longer get that premium if we pay Carer's Allowance to you.
If [Test Casenine]'s Pension Credit includes an extra amount for severe disability, they may no longer get that extra amount if we pay Carer's Allowance to you.
This could also affect any reduction in Council Tax [Test Casenine] may be entitled to. To find out more about it, please contact the Local Authority.

We will need to check [Test Casenine] entitlement to Disability Living Allowance, Personal Independence Payment, Attendance Allowance, Constant Attendance Allowance or Armed Forces Independence Payment when considering your claim.
We may contact [Test Casenine] or their representative to establish whether 35 hours caring per week is taking place.

DisclaimerQuestion.QuestionLabel: Please tick this box to declare that you have understood the notes and you have made / will make the person you are caring for / or their representative aware that there could be a change to their benefits.

Evidence.Title: Your Self-employed documents.
Evidence.Content: Most recent finalised accounts you have for your business.
Any pension statements you may have.
The Carer's Allowance unit will contact you if they need any further information.

Consent.QuestionLabel: Do you agree to us getting information from any other person or organisation you have told us about on this claim?
